title: Fight (Part 2)
body:
Fight (Part 2)

Valery looked at the sealed Carlos while panting heavily. She knew Carlso was still alive and will soon break free from it.

After knowing she won't be able to kill Carlos, Valery decided to use all of her power to seal him for some time so that she can escape from here.

She turned around and saw Evan who was around one hundred meters away.

Valery's face was pale and a faint tickle of blood coming out from the corner of her mouth.

She used all of her strength and ran towards Evan.

"He won't be able to come out for about a minute let's get out from here" Valery quickly said after coming near Evan and both of them ran towards the exit.

Evan glanced at Valery and saw her face was pale and her body kept shaking while running.

He would have helped her but his body was also in bad shape after using mana reinforcement earlier, so he can't do anything about the situation.

ROAR-!!
